metadata.title: CVE-2022-21719 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. All GLPI versionsprior to 9.5.7 are vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting. Version9.5.7 contains a patch for this issue. There are no known workarounds.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
